Simon Guest is a technical advisor who helps educational organizations create exceptional software and hardware used by millions of students worldwide.

With extensive software engineering leadership experience at Code.org, Amazon, SAP, and Microsoft, Simon brings deep technical expertise to the intersection of education and technology. He is an active contributor to open-source education projects, articles and books, conference speaker, and regularly teaches at the K-12 and undergraduate level.
